title: Existence Pending
description: It's been ten years since the Alma Cefeira defeated the luos Deidra and effectively destroyed the Other Side. But when Emily moves to Arizona with her sister, their time of peace comes to an end. Secrets are threatened with revelation, emotions mix with pleasure to create chaos, and Emily must face the fact that there's only one way out of Flagstaff - war.
author: F.L. Mahoney
